full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 244 of 262 1955 LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross 1 Q. Now, it never appeared to you that Ghislaine was pregnant at any time; right? 2 A. No. 3 Q. You never saw any pictures of her pregnant at any of the residences; right? 4 A. No. 5 Q. Now, whatever the personal relationship between them might 6 have been, at some point in the 1990s, that stopped; right? 7 A. Correct. 8 Q. From your perspective; right? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. She still worked for Epstein; right? 11 A. Yes. 12 Q. She still took care of the residences? 13 A. Correct. 14 Q. And she was still his friend; right? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. But it seemed to you that she no longer had a romantic 17 relationship with him; right? 18 A. Correct. 19 Q. And in the 2000s, it seemed like Ghislaine's role in his 20 life was lessening; isn't that right? 21 A. Yes. 22 Q. Epstein brought in other people to help him run his 23 day-to-day business at that point; right? 24 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019106

1 Q. Now, it never appeared to you that Ghislaine was pregnant at any time; right? 2 A. No. 3 Q. You never saw any pictures of her pregnant at any of the residences; right? 4 A. No. 5 Q. Now, whatever the personal relationship between them might 6 have been, at some point in the 1990s, that stopped; right? 7 A. Correct. 8 Q. From your perspective; right? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. She still worked for Epstein; right? 11 A. Yes. 12 Q. She still took care of the residences? 13 A. Correct. 14 Q. And she was still his friend; right? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. But it seemed to you that she no longer had a romantic 17 relationship with him; right? 18 A. Correct. 19 Q. And in the 2000s, it seemed like Ghislaine's role in his 20 life was lessening; isn't that right? 21 A. Yes. 22 Q. Epstein brought in other people to help him run his 23 day-to-day business at that point; right? 24 25
